Comment: I partially agree with this.   I think the problem is that there is a lot of non transparency into how taxes are spent, and a lot of questions over whether there is price gouging, mishandling of funds, or even strait up theft.   There are well known stories like the “600 dollar hammer” that lead people to question whether their taxes are 1) actually being used for what they’re supposed to be and 2) whether contractors are gouging the government     That gouging is theft - from us.   If there was a lot more transparency into accounting at the local, state, and federal levels people would be a lot more trusting. Hell - that’s our money, I think all of that accounting should be public.
